chapters.title: Chapter 47: The Grave is No Bar to My Call
chapters.info: Birgitte, p. 660 (581)—One of the heroes of Legend called back from the dead by the Horn of Valere. She has golden hair, and carries a silver bow and arrows with which she never misses. She is always linked to Gaidal Cain in the stories. See also Cain, Gaidal.
